trans-unit.source: Associates activities together in a correlation by representing a particular shared <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey"></xref> or transient context in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 會將產生關聯的活動一起相互關聯中代表特定的共用<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey"></xref>或工作流程中的暫時性內容。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wf](~/add/includes/wf-md.md)] provides four types of correlation: [Content Based](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Request-Reply](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Durable Duplex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Context Exchange](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wf](~/add/includes/wf-md.md)]提供四種類型的相互關聯︰[內容基礎](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[要求-回覆](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[永久性雙工](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[Context Exchange](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] correlation, see [Correlation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), the specific correlation types mentioned previously, and the correlation samples located in the [Services [WF Samples]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) node of the [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/add/includes/wf1-md.md)] samples.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]相互關聯，請參閱[相互關聯概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)、 特定的相互關聯類型先前所述，和相互關聯範例位於[服務 [WF 範例]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)節點[!INCLUDE[wf1](~/add/includes/wf1-md.md)]範例。

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>相互關聯是否存在，否則**CorrelatesWith**將使用訊息活動的屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果都沒有，所提供的環境控制代碼<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>或使用工作流程服務。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Registers the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> with the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: 註冊<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref>與工作流程執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> with the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: 取消註冊<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref>與工作流程執行階段。
